title: Avatar's Bitter Work and the Importance of Connection
author: Five by Five Takes
comment: everything is connected!!! great work fox!!
Wow this was beautiful. I didn't realize how far the Lightning metaphor extended into Zuko's... Everything
Never noticed just how connected jing and the chakras were connected and utilized in this episode.  Thanks for the awesome video!

Idk what it's about your voice or/and your narrations skills, but you always show the best of what are you talking about. The feelings I get wile listening to your videos it's enduring, almost life changing reflexion just out in the internet. Everything you make, at least that I saw, it's amazing. Keep talking, because what you are saying matters and helps people grow, just as the character we love do.
Damn, wasn't planning on crying this morning
